description_zh: 新建一个颗粒喷雾。一种装饰性的视觉效果。
description_en: Create a spray of particles.  Useful for visual effects.

conditions.description_zh: 检测粒子的发射模式是否为持续发射。
conditions.description_en: True if the continuous spray is currently enabled.

actions.description_zh: 设置此对象的背景混合模式。
actions.description_en: Set the background blend mode for this object.

actions.description_zh: 可选择指定一个对象作为粒子图像，而不是绘制粒子本身的图像。
actions.description_en: Set an object to spawn as particles instead of using the particle image.

actions.description_zh: 取消已设置成粒子图像的对象，重新启用粒子本身的图像。
actions.description_en: Remove any object set to spawn as particles, reverting back to using the particle image.

actions.description_zh: 在粒子准备播放之前，预先加速粒子的流动状态，适用于初始化。
actions.description_en: Skip the particle effect forwards in time. Useful for preparing an initial particle effect.

actions.description_zh: 设置初始粒子速度。
actions.description_en: Set the initial particle speed.

actions.description_zh: 设置每个粒子的初始大小。
actions.description_en: Set the initial size of each particle.

actions.description_zh: 设置初始粒子不透明度。
actions.description_en: Set the initial particle opacity.

actions.description_zh: 设置初始粒子生长速率。
actions.description_en: Set the initial particle grow rate.

actions.description_zh: 设置粒子在X轴初始位置的随机值。
actions.description_en: Set the initial particle X randomiser.

actions.description_zh: 设置粒子在Y轴初始位置的随机偏移值。
actions.description_en: Set the initial particle Y randomiser.

actions.description_zh: 设置粒子初始速度的随机偏移值。
actions.description_en: Set the random addition to particle speed on creation.

actions.description_zh: 在创建时将随机添加设置为粒度。
actions.description_en: Set the random addition to particle size on creation.

actions.description_zh: 在创建时将随机添加设置为粒子增长率。
actions.description_en: Set the random addition to particle grow rate on creation.

actions.description_zh: 设置粒子加速度。
actions.description_en: Set the particle acceleration.

actions.description_zh: 设置重力。
actions.description_en: Set the force of gravity.

actions.description_zh: 设置每秒的最大随机角度偏差。
actions.description_en: Set the random angle deflection over time.

actions.description_zh: 调整随机偏移速度，以像素/秒为单位。
actions.description_en: Set the random speed adjustment over time.

actions.description_zh: 调整随机偏移不透明度。
actions.description_en: Set the random opacity adjustment over time.

actions.description_zh: 将销毁超时或淡入淡出设置为不可见时间。
actions.description_en: Set the destroy timeout or fade to invisible time.

actions.description_zh: 启用或禁用粒子。
actions.description_en: Enable or disable the continuous spray.

actions.description_zh: 设置每秒创建的粒子数。
actions.description_en: Set the number of particles created per second.

actions.description_zh: 粒子创建时的发射角度范围。
actions.description_en: Set the number of degrees through which particles are created.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒每像素的粒子初始速度
expressions.description_en: The initial particle speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.description_zh: 以像素增长的粒子初始大小
expressions.description_en: The initial particle size, in pixels.

expressions.description_zh: 从0到100透明度的粒子初始透明度
expressions.description_en: The initial particle opacity, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

expressions.description_zh: 每秒每像素增长的粒子初始增长率
expressions.description_en: The initial particle grow rate, in pixels per second.

expressions.description_zh: 粒子在X轴初始位置的随机值。
expressions.description_en: The random X offset on creation.

expressions.description_zh: 粒子在Y轴初始位置的随机值。
expressions.description_en: The random Y offset on creation.

expressions.description_zh: 在创建时随机添加粒子速度。
expressions.description_en: The random addition to particle speed on creation.

expressions.description_zh: 在粒子创建时，对大小增加一个随机值。
expressions.description_en: The random addition to particle size on creation.

expressions.description_zh: 在粒子创建时，对增长率增加一个随机值。
expressions.description_en: The random addition to particle grow rate on creation.

expressions.description_zh: 粒子加速度，以每秒每秒的像素数为单位。
expressions.description_en: The particle acceleration in pixels per second per second.

expressions.description_zh: 重力，以每秒每秒的像素数为单位。
expressions.description_en: The force of gravity in pixels per second per second.

expressions.description_zh: 粒子的最大随机角度偏差，以角度每秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The maximum random angle deflection in degrees per second.

expressions.description_zh: 粒子的最大随机速度偏差，以像素每秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The maximum random change in speed in pixels per second per second.

expressions.description_zh: 每秒不透明度的最大变化。
expressions.description_en: The maximum change in opacity per second.

expressions.description_zh: 破坏或淡化到隐形超时。
expressions.description_en: The destroy or fade to invisible timeout.
The number of particles created per second.
The number of degrees through which particles are created.

properties.description_zh: 每秒创建的粒子数，或一次性的总粒子数。
properties.description_en: Number of particles to create per second, or total for one-shot.

properties.description_zh: 粒子创建时的发射角度范围。
properties.description_en: Number of degrees through which particles are created.

properties.description_zh: 无论是喷雾还是一次喷射的颗粒。
properties.description_en: Either a spray or a one-shot blast of particles.

properties.description_zh: 点击编辑粒子图像
properties.description_en: Click to edit the particle image.

properties.description_zh: 在编辑器中进行实时预览。
properties.description_en: Tick to run a live preview in the editor.

properties.description_zh: 影响每个粒子创建的属性。
properties.description_en: Properties affecting the creation of each particle.

properties.description_zh: 粒子的初始喷射速度。
properties.description_en: Initial particle speed, in pixels per second.

properties.description_zh: 粒子的初始大小。
properties.description_en: Initial size of each particle, in pixels.

properties.description_zh: 粒子的初始不透明度。
properties.description_en: Initial opacity of each particle, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

properties.description_zh: 粒子大小会随时间而增长，若增长率为负值，则逐渐变小。
properties.description_en: Rate the size changes over time, in pixels per second.

properties.description_zh: 粒子在X轴的初始位置随机值。
properties.description_en: Random X co-ordinate offset on creation.

properties.description_zh: 粒子在Y轴的初始位置随机值。
properties.description_en: Random Y co-ordinate offset on creation.

properties.description_zh: 粒子初始速度的随机偏移值。
properties.description_en: Random addition to particle speed on creation.

properties.description_zh: 粒子初始大小的随机偏移值。
properties.description_en: Random addition to particle size on creation.

properties.description_zh: 粒子初始增长率的随机偏移值。
properties.description_en: Random addition to particle grow rate on creation.

properties.description_zh: 影响每个粒子行为的属性。
properties.description_en: Properties affecting the behavior of each particle.

properties.description_zh: 每个粒子的加速度，以每秒像素/秒为单位。
properties.description_en: Acceleration of each particle, in pixels per second per second.

properties.description_zh: 重力，以每秒像素/秒为单位。
properties.description_en: Force of gravity, in pixels per second per second.

properties.description_zh: 调整随机偏移角度，以度数/秒为单位。
properties.description_en: A random angle deflection to apply over time.

properties.description_zh: 调整随机偏移速度，以像素/秒为单位。
properties.description_en: A random speed adjustment to apply over time.

properties.description_zh: 调整随机偏移不透明度。
properties.description_en: A random opacity adjustment to apply over time.

properties.description_zh: 选择何时销毁每个粒子。
properties.description_en: Choose when each individual particle is destroyed.

properties.description_zh: 粒子超时或淡出至不可见的时间，以秒为单位。这取决于超时销毁属性。
properties.description_en: Time in seconds for timeout or fade to invisible (depending on destroy mode).

properties.description_zh: 可选择指定一个对象作为粒子图像，而不是绘制粒子本身的图像。
properties.description_en: Optionally choose an object to spawn as particles instead of drawing the particle image.

properties.description_zh: 在场景开始时，对象是否可见。
properties.description_en: Choose whether the object is visible when the layout starts.
